sources.title: Buddy's Day Out
sources.description: Title: Buddy's Day Out Summary: Buddy prepare for his romantic picnic with Cookie but along the way she takes her baby little brother Elmer. Directed by: Tom Palmer Actors: Production Company: Leon Schlesinger Studios Release Date: 9 September 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Buddy prepare for his romantic picnic with Cookie but along the way she takes her baby little brother Elmer.

metadata.Plot: Buddy prepare for his romantic picnic with Cookie but along the way she takes her baby little brother Elmer.
